name: Hilton Bandung
detail: Local travelers who rarely frequent Bandung, especially those from Jakarta, would be pleasantly surprised when they stay at Hilton Bandung. Set with lower expectations of how nice 5-star hotels in Bandung would fare compared to the ones in Jakarta, these travelers would be quite awed with Hilton Bandung's modern and sophisticated design that is done flawlessly without forgoing comfort. So if you're looking for a modernly aesthetic, comfortable hotel in Bandung, Hilton Bandung can be your best bet.

name: Collection O Hotel Pasar Baru Heritage
detail: I love that it's cheap! perfect for my short stay in Bandung
area: Bandung City Center,Bandung - View on map

name: Dancenter Promenade Near Cihampelas Walk
detail: Staff semua very great job ramah, membantu, thankyou guys üôèüèª

name: Holiday Inn Bandung Pasteur By IHG
detail: We booked a few rooms as we were going as a large family, and had a great overall experience. Rooms were nicely furnished, had everything we needed and service was exceptional. Check-in was smooth and quick, and we enjoyed our stay here. The hotel is located in an area with lots of street food and restaurants (I recommend the grilled banana at a kiosk opposite the hotel, as well as chicken porridge that's great for breakfast, also opposite the hotel), and also has a great view of Tangkuban Perahu and depending on which room you get, you may also be able to see planes landing and taking off at the nearby airport. Would recommend this to other travellers and would return if I visit Bandung again.

name: Aryaduta Bandung
detail: I stayed in this hotel during my business trip in Bandung and had a 2 days meeting which has to be relocated in the last minutes. Surprisingly the hotel staff offered me the meeting room. They arranged everything perfectly, professionally and made my meetings went smoothly. Many thanks for all the staff who made this possible. Another thing I noticed is they are striving to make their client satisfied and this is something that I never found in other 5 stars hotels in Bandung. Definitely will stay in this hotel again, as always =)

name: Ibis Bandung Trans Studio
detail: I booked 5 rooms for my family (9 aldults,1 Children). It was my first trip to bandung, Cleaniness of the hotel 10/10, Service 10/10, Comfort 10/10. Bolster is provided in the room!! Next to Trans studio mall, everything can found there for family dine in. Ibis hotel is far away from the attraction or places like Pasar baru. Everything was perfect about this hotel. FULLY RECOMMENDED for those looking for hotel in bandung. Tips for those booked this hotel, plan for itinery properly. Everywhere u go its going to be very bad jam. avoid weekends. AWESOME HOTEL!!
area: Bandung City Center,Bandung - View on map

name: Courtyard by Marriott Bandung Dago
detail: I stayed for 1 night only here on 22-23 Dec 2018 (Something that I regret, should book for longer stay). I booked 2 rooms of Deluxe Queen, North Wing. Here is the summary of what I've experience and overall impression of my stay. Pros: - This hotel is newly refurbished and rebranding from the previous Holiday Inn Dago into Courtyard by Marriott Bandung, so you can expect the interior feels refreshed and new. I love the new modern design especially in the room. Even for the lowest category, the room still feels so luxurious and cozy. Bed & duvet are so smooth and fluffy although I actually prefer more firm bed for better back support but its still feel very comfortable. I think the room cozyness is the main highlight here. It makes you feel like you don't want to go outside. Even better is the view from the room. I got rooms in 6th floor facing north to Dago area so we can see the mountainous landscape of North Bandung. Feels very refreshing to have such a view from your room. The bathroom also looks so luxurious and exclusive. Although no bathtub for this room category, but we got a toilet with integrated bidet and shower with 2 choices of hand and rain shower. The bathroom amenities are provided by Nirvae. In my opinion this is the best 4-stars hotel bedroom in Bandung (from around 7 to 8 4-stars hotel I've tried so far in Bandung) - Parking space is quite a lot here. The common problem with hotel in Bandung is limited parking space. Here in Courtyard I think its not a really big problem as they have ample parking space including several level of basement (although basement a little small) - Breakfast quality is top notch. Although the variety could really use some improvement. 1 flaw thing here that I noticed was the croissant (I'm a big fan of it) was more like bread than puff pastry. A little bit dissapointed on that, but still enjoying my breakfast there. - The front office staff is really kind and helpful . My check in/out process was smooth and e

name: The Luxton Hotel
detail: I had a wonderful stay at The Luxton. The breakfast was excellent. The room is very clean n comfortable. My kids enjoyed swimming eventhough it rained evryday bec of the indoor swimming pool. My kids love the kids club. The only thing that need improvement is the parking area which is too small. But tht's not a big problem coz thy provide free vallet parking which is very helpful. This will be one of my favourite hotel in Bandung.

name: Grand Hotel Preanger
detail: I knew this hotel had a long history and reputation. But in the midst of new competitions from more modern hotels, I had thought that this hotel would probably finding it hard to maintain its service and reputation. I WAS WRONG ! The service was outstanding beyond my expectation. I expected a 4-star service from an old hotel, instead me and family received (and observed) a 5-star service standard being carried out by the staffs. The breakfast quality was also in a high standard, and for the price it was way worth it! I had a wonderful stay, room was large, my baby daughter had fun running around, there was also a swimming pool. I love the location because it's actually within walking distance of some old spots like Braga or Sunda or Naripan. It's the real Bandung atmosphere any visitors would need to have. So anytime a friend asks for a recommended hotel in Bandung, if he/she is travelling with family, my answer will always be Preanger !
area: Bandung City Center,Bandung - View on map

name: Novotel Bandung Hotel
detail: we stayed at this hotel for 4 days & 3 nights in october 2012. this hotel implementing a good security measures to protect their customers. there will be a car check up by the security officer before you are allowed to proceed to the hotel lobby entrance. at the lobby entrance we were welcomed by the hotel staff which is friendly & helpful. during the check in process, we were attended with smile by the reception officer. for the room, we requested for a non-smoking room & we stayed at level 10 of the hotel. the room is clean and satisfactorily. equipped with basic facilities such as bath tub, lcd tv, kettle, comfortable bed, complimentary toiletries & bottled water and safety box. the room just nice for a traveler with a small baby like us & comfortable enough to rest ourselves after the whole day of trip around bandung city. before i forgot, you can go away with the bandung traffic noise if you stay at this hotel because it is not located immediately at the roadside like many other hotels in bandung. this is extra point to stay again at this hotel. we were also had our breakfast at this hotel during our stay. the food is nice with choices of few asian food. however, there were nothing like sausages, nuggets or chicken slice during our stay and we think it is worth to be provided in future for service betterment. in short, we recommended this hotel for those looking for a hotel in bandung (i even bumped into this hotel gm, mr marak during his morning rounding). thank you.
